_metadata.description: Requirements registry for Bookmark Intelligence Hub scenario

requirements.title: Multi-tenant authentication with profile-specific processing
requirements.description: Implement multi-tenant authentication system that isolates bookmark processing per user profile with secure credential storage.

validation.notes: Test profile isolation and authentication flows

requirements.title: Modular social platform integration for X, Reddit, TikTok
requirements.description: Build modular integration system supporting X, Reddit, and TikTok with extensible plugin architecture for future platforms.

validation.notes: Test each platform adapter and plugin loading

requirements.title: AI-powered content categorization with user-defined buckets
requirements.description: Implement AI categorization engine using Ollama/Qdrant for semantic matching with user-configurable category buckets and rules.

validation.notes: Test categorization accuracy and rule matching

requirements.title: Action suggestion engine with approval/rejection workflow
requirements.description: Build action suggestion system that analyzes categorized content and proposes workflow actions with user approval mechanisms.

validation.notes: Test action suggestion logic and approval workflows

requirements.title: Cross-scenario integration API for consuming organized data
requirements.description: Expose REST API endpoints allowing other scenarios to query organized bookmark data and subscribe to categorization events.

validation.notes: Test API endpoints with mock scenario consumers

requirements.title: Real-time bookmark processing with configurable polling intervals
requirements.description: Implement bookmark processing engine with configurable polling intervals and queue-based processing for real-time updates.

validation.notes: Test polling mechanism and queue processing

requirements.title: Integration with data-structurer for unstructured text processing
requirements.description: Integrate with data-structurer scenario to extract structured data from unstructured social media content.

requirements.title: Integration with scenario-authenticator for multi-tenant support
requirements.description: Integrate with scenario-authenticator for centralized user management and authentication across scenarios.

requirements.title: Intelligent learning system improving categorization over time
requirements.description: Implement feedback loop system that learns from user approval/rejection patterns to improve categorization accuracy.

validation.notes: Test learning algorithm and accuracy improvements

requirements.title: Bulk action approval for similar content types
requirements.description: Add bulk approval UI and API endpoints allowing users to approve/reject multiple similar actions at once.

validation.ref: UI test for bulk approval flow

requirements.title: Export functionality to external systems (CSV, JSON, API)
requirements.description: Implement export capabilities allowing users to extract organized bookmark data in CSV, JSON formats or via API webhooks.

validation.notes: Test all export formats and data integrity

requirements.title: Advanced filtering and search across organized bookmarks
requirements.description: Build search and filtering system supporting full-text search, category filters, date ranges, and semantic similarity.

validation.notes: Test search accuracy and performance with 10K+ bookmarks

requirements.title: Browser extension for real-time bookmark categorization
requirements.description: Develop browser extension that categorizes bookmarks in real-time as users save them across platforms.

validation.notes: Test real-time categorization across major browsers

requirements.title: Mobile app for on-the-go bookmark management
requirements.description: Build mobile application for iOS/Android enabling bookmark review and action approval on mobile devices.

validation.notes: Test core workflows on mobile platforms

requirements.title: Advanced analytics on bookmark patterns and productivity outcomes
requirements.description: Implement analytics dashboard showing bookmark patterns, categorization trends, and productivity metrics from action completions.

validation.notes: Verify metrics accuracy and visualization quality

requirements.title: Integration with calendar systems for time-based action scheduling
requirements.description: Integrate with calendar services to automatically schedule follow-up actions based on bookmark content and timing patterns.

validation.notes: Test with Google Calendar and Outlook

requirements.title: Collaborative bookmark sharing within teams
requirements.description: Add team collaboration features allowing shared bookmark collections, collective categorization, and team action workflows.

validation.notes: Test sharing, permissions, and collaborative workflows
